about.title: ABOUT US
about.description: Sanatorium 'SAF' is a place where care for your health and rest combine with comfort and natural harmony.
about.video.unsupported: Your browser does not support video.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.text: We strive to create a unique space where every guest can find harmony with themselves and nature. Our programs are aimed at full body recovery, improving emotional well-being, and enhancing quality of life.
advantages.title: Our Main Advantages
advantages.health.title: Health Programs
advantages.health.description: A set of procedures to strengthen the body: massages, relaxing sessions, and gentle cleansing methods. Proven techniques and tools are used.
advantages.health.extra: Consultations with a physiotherapist according to schedule
advantages.nutrition.title: Balanced Nutrition
advantages.nutrition.description: Meals are tailored to individual needs. The menu includes dishes made from fresh ingredients, some grown on-site.
advantages.nutrition.extra: Dietary and vegan meals available upon request
advantages.accommodation.title: Comfortable Accommodation
advantages.accommodation.description: Cozy rooms with modern amenities: air conditioning, TV, Wi-Fi. Regular cleaning and service are included.
advantages.spa.title: Spa & Pool
advantages.spa.description: Guests can enjoy a sauna, hammam, and a hydromassage pool. Water-based fitness sessions are held regularly.
advantages.leisure.title: Leisure Organization
advantages.leisure.description: Assistance with planning activities, booking excursions and transfers. Staff available 24/7.
advantages.nature.title: Close to Nature
advantages.nature.description: The resort is located in a green area with walking paths and relaxation zones. Outdoor yoga and fresh air walks available.
advantages.nature.extra: Guided tours around the area are offered
rooms.title: OUR ROOMS
rooms.cards.standard.title: Standard
rooms.cards.standard.description: Cozy room with basic amenities for a comfortable stay.
rooms.cards.lux.title: Junior Suite
rooms.cards.lux.description: Spacious room with upgraded conditions and additional amenities.
rooms.cards.presidential.title: Suite
rooms.cards.presidential.description: Exclusive room for those who appreciate luxury and personalized service.
